spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The mage is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence. The mage has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Halfling Nimbleness
entries: Manafret can move through a space of a Medium or larger creature.

trait.name: Brave
entries: Manafret has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage. Or Ranged Weapon Attack: {@hit 5} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.
